argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsdiagrhm.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | pwsdiagrhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | pwsdiagrhm.f | |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( I X. { x } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_pwsring | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> Y e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. Ring ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_pwsdiagghm | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom Y ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom Y ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) |
| 13 | 10, 2 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13, 3 | #P_pwsdiagmhm | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` Y ) = ( mulGrp ` Y ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 10, 12, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22 | #P_pwsmgp | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) /\ ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) /\ ( y e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) /\ z e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) -> ( y ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) z ) = ( y ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) z ) ) |
| 26 | 23 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) /\ ( y e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) /\ z e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) ) -> ( y ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) z ) = ( y ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) z ) ) |
| 28 | 16, 17, 16, 24, 25, 27 | #P_mhmpropd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( ( mulGrp ` R ) ^s I ) ) ) |
| 29 | 15, 28 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) |
| 30 | 9, 29 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> ( F e. ( R GrpHom Y ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 31 | 10, 18 | #P_isrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom Y ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom Y ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) ) ) |
| 32 | 6, 30, 31 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( R RingHom Y ) ) |
